item.title: Duffy the Haechi: A Korean Myth Story
item.description: Are you ready to dive deep into the fascinating world of Korean mythology, especially when it features a character as cool as **Duffy the Haechi** (해치) from “K-Pop Demon Hunters”? Trust me, this isn’t just a fun character; it’s a window into the heart of Korean culture, a guardian of justice whose stories have been passed down through generations like precious heirlooms. Growing up in Korea, these mythical creatures weren’t just illustrations in old books; they were almost like invisible friends, always there, subtly influencing our understanding of right and wrong, much like how your favorite K-drama heroes inspire you today.
